mapper.select: SELECT ur.id, ur.recipe_id AS recipeId, r.name AS name, r.image AS image, r.cooking_method AS cookingMethod, r.suitable_time AS suitableTime, r.calories AS calories, r.carbohydrate AS carbohydrate, r.salt AS salt FROM user_recipes ur INNER JOIN recipes r ON ur.recipe_id = r.recipe_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId}
